column5: Had a great weekend it started off with a good friend coming down from Toronto as a house guest Friday night some of you here know him as a muskies Canada member and some of you Punk rockers might know his as john the lead singer from the 3 tards, after great times and many laughs Friday night it was time for a quick nap as 4:30 was coming early.John and I fished the belle river muskies Canada outing Saturday John took first place with his personal best 48.5" he also caught 3 other nice musky on Saturday.              I only managed two small musky biggest around 38" the other I shook off boat side   John headed home Saturday night taking his first place trophy and new high of his Personal Best 48.5"X21" with him. That was for the better as Mother Nature had other plans for LSC in the Morning the wind was howling from the North with 4' waves crashing the south shore.I stayed home to build lures as the winds were supposed to calm down around 7pm. I made the choice around 4pm to head out fishing and battle the big waves. What normally takes 4 min to drive my boat to this spot took me 25 min but it paid off. I landed a nice 47"X18" and one cast later a awesome 51"X21" both fish on my new brown frog handlebarz what a great way to end the weekend. I just wish my wife was not sick and could have been there to net my fish I did miss her out there.      Well its 5:04 Im done reporting this now its time to meet up with another member of the Belle River Chapter of Muskies Canada and see if we can put some more slime in the boat I love having weekdays off work as the boat traffic will be minimal.
Thanks for sharing, some nice fish!

nice job thanks for sharing, I got the bad news about LSC mid Saturday saying the winds were too tough but looks like you battled the waves and it paid off, now I'm booked for oct 20 hopefully it's not too chilly!
You really have them dialed in this year Mike!  Hoping the good karma associated with the trip in a few weeks holds on!
I enjoy sharing Matt  Leaf it was Nasty all day and a good call by the guide.  I hear ya cliff it's just a couple weekends away let's hope to top last years auction winning trip.
That is too cool.  I've seen the 3tards a couple times live a few years ago.  Oh and nice muskies
Joey you might like this John sent me the song better you then me no lyrics to use.
Some very nice fish mike !!!! Well done
Great pictures and report Mike.  I gotta get down there soon!!!
Thanks FD  Joey it will be good to see you guys this year again.
